title: 109_s3654
content: Recycling Investment Saves Energy or the RISE Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) allow a taxpayer election of a tax credit for 15 of the cost of qualified reuse and recycling property or a tax deduction for 50 of the adjusted basis of such property. And (2) define solid waste disposal facilities to include reuse and recycling functions for purposes of tax-exempt bond financing.
